item.description:
Joint event with the Boston Euro Social Meetup Group led by Maia...we only have 10 spots!

Charmingfare Farm website http://www.visitthefarm.com/

I have experienced it myself last sunday! only an hour from Boston!

Great winter outing!

15-20 min ride on a wagon, pulled by two horse, enjoy of winter country side scencery, observe some farm animals, decorations, stop at the bon fire (very powerful two fire pits), enjoy frying hot dogs, marshmellows , sipping hot chocolate, walk around, (for an hour, or more if you'd like), hop back to the wagon, and get amuzed by the zoo animals on a ride back!( reindeer, camel, and more!) bring more food for potluck/picnic, if you 'd like, (wine or beer allowed)

Very relaxing, refreshing and stimulating involvement!

I have purchased tickets for the group, for a discounted, group price, reg for a ticket $25 per person, discounted price $15 per person!

no cancellation, rescheduling. only if farm cancells for weather related problems!

If you dare to join, please RSVP "yes", pay by paypal to maia_lov@hotmail.com Maia Yulov or send me personal check, i ll provide address by email when you ask. and mark if you'd like to carpool, (need a ride/offering a ride from what area), please offer gas money who are the guests on a ride. Please mark if you'd like to add a potluck, or hotdog enough.

 

Please wear layers, winter pants, warm boots, gloves, hats, jackets, have warm blankets and happy you!

Looking forward!

Warmly,

Maia
item.how_to_find_us: Find Maia at parking lot, or by the store (close to each other) 781-718-6203 The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group
item.name: Horse ride,bon fire,winter picnic and get amuzed by zoo animals! all in one trip
